data.title: Luxembourg live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Luxembourg live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Luxembourg live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Luxembourg next match

Luxembourg will play the next match against Northern Ireland on Sep 5, 2024, 6:45:00 PM UTC in UEFA Nations League.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Northern Ireland vs Luxembourg live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Luxembourg matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Luxembourg previous match

Luxembourg previous match was against Belgium in International Friendly Games, the match ended with result 3 - 0 (Belgium won the match).

Luxembourg fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Luxembourg scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Luxembourg performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Luxembourg matches.

Current Luxembourg players

Forward: Gerson Rodrigues, Alessio Curci, Aiman Dardari, Jayson Videira Pereira Midfielder: Danel Sinani, Christopher Martins Pereira, Sebastien Thill, Mathias Olesen, David Jonathans, Mirza Mustafić, Chris Philipps Defender: Maxime Chanot, Laurent Jans, Enes Mahmutović, Dirk Carlson, Vahid Selimović, Eldin Džogović, Sofiane Ikene, Fabio Lohei Goalkeeper: Anthony Moris, Tiago Pereira Cardoso, Ralph Schon, Lucas Fox, Lucas Fox

The current Luxembourg roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Luxembourg top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
